name: hxcollision
description: Separating Axis Theorom based collisions for Polygons and Circles. Not specific to any library, but includes tests and drawing classes for OpenFL. Initially Ported from rocketmandevelopment as3 classes.
releasenote: - Renamed `Polygon.normalPolygon` to `Polygon.create` - Added `testShapeList` for testing one shape with many - Added changes to the test to display the unitVector response (soon to be renamed also) - Migrating to more integration friendly api, and more logical order of arguments for shapes.  - Making rotation on the base shapes absolute (submitted by @grapefrukt).  - Adding name and data flag to BaseShape
